column4: i am not able to stat mysql on my box i am running ubuntu 10.10 the output i get is "start: Unknown job: mysql"  http://paste.ubuntu.com/589792/
once you install mysql and finish setup, it will start auto with your system, no need to /etc/init.d/mysql start
seems okay to me, now you can install phpmyadmin data-base from your synaptic
